fullText: Rebecca Hall gives a riveting performance as a woman trapped by social conventions in Sophie Treadwell's 1928 drama, directed with stark intensity by Lyndsey Turner.
dtliExcerpt: Rebecca Hall gives a riveting performance as a woman trapped by social conventions in Sophie Treadwell's 1928 drama, directed with stark intensity by Lyndsey Turner.
